description1.part1: Affine is the next-generation collaborative knowledge base for professionals.
description1.part2: It's not just a collection of Docs, whiteboard, and tables.
description1.part3: Transform any building block as you like.
description1.part4: Say goodbye to redundancy. Store your data once, and keep your data as you like it.

description2.part2: Docs, Kanbans, and Databases are all fully functional anywhere, anytime. A truly what-you-see-is-what-you-get environment for your data.
description2.part3: All pages come with a document (Paper Mode) and whiteboard (Edgeless Mode) view.

description3.part2: No more chaos managing multiple views.
description3.part3: Set a TODO with Markdown, and seamlessly edit it within a Kanban.
description3.part4: Managing multi-dimensional tables should be this simple - and now it is.

description4.part1: Privacy-first, and collaborative. No compromises whatsoever.
description4.part2: We don't like being locked-in, and neither should you. Privacy is at the foundation of everything we do, but it should not limit us that's why there are no compromises.
description4.part3: Your data is yours;it is always locally stored and secured - available to you always. While still being able to enjoy collaboration features such as real-time editing and sharing with others, without any cloud setup.

translation.BuildFor: Build for an open and semantic future
